personal.name: Divya Jana
personal.title: Senior EDA Automation & DevOps Engineer
personal.summary: VLSI Automation Engineer with nearly 5 years of experience in building scalable automation frameworks, optimizing ASIC workflows, and integrating AI/ML solutions into EDA ecosystems. Strong expertise in Python, CI/CD, ML, and ASIC validation flows, with a proven ability to reduce cycle time, enhance reliability, and streamline team operations.

achievements: Developed a fully automated debugging & validation framework that reduced bug resolution time by 25%.
Integrated multiple EDA flows including VCS, Xcelium, Questasim, Spyglass, VCFormal, and Design Compiler.
Automated Jira filing and validation workflows, reducing manual engineering effort by 30%.
Built hybrid support for Perforce and Git, improving team flexibility across projects.
Created a robust pre-submit checks flow for Perforce, reducing trunk errors by 30%.
Developed GitLab pre-MR pipelines that cut pipeline runtime by 50% using parallel executions.
Supported software development tasks and strengthened foundational engineering skills.
